original_text: We need to teach people to love one another with pure thoughts. They need to be sure in their minds that they are living in a good way. They need to trust God completely.
korean_text: 이 교훈의 목적은 청결한 마음과 선한 양심과 거짓이 없는 믿음에서 나오는 사랑이거늘

sentences.original_text: They need to be sure in their minds
that they are living in a good way
sentences.korean_translation: 자신들이 좋은 방식으로 살고 있다는 것을

sentences.original_text: They need to trust God completely
